title: Just realized Evelynn and Lucian have recalls that sync
body:
https://i.imgur.com/d37aGjc.gifv

{{champion:236}}  finally decides to try dating again and ends up with {{champion:28}}. 

{{champion:28}} :​"I've seen your wife. You can do better."

Oh my. Ship created.

Tahm gave TF his powers.

TF wanted the ult to save Eve, but failed to.

Eve was TF's former lover and was turned by Tahm.

TF left Graves to go save Eve.

Riot games is actually run by a DVD copy of Sharktale.

Invest your money into gold!
